short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: No need to search for coupons & deals. Get them right in your browser with Rebate Ruth and get cashback on every purchase.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Rebate Ruth Notifier is the ultimate personal shopping assistant to access cashback deals when you shop at participating stores online.

Add Rebate Ruth’s Browser Notifier and never miss out on cash rebates or shopping deals again! The Rebate Ruth Notifier will alert you of your favourite deals.

We reward you for shopping that you would ordinarily do at your favourite stores, with the added benefit of earning cashback.

It’s simple. 
When the Notifier appears for a store, click “Activate now” to track your shop and let the savings roll in. 

Leading brands and stores.
With cashback offers from all your favourite stores to choose from, you can build your cashback balance quickly and use it however you wish! Simply withdraw to your bank or PayPal account.

Cashback, coupons and deals.
You don’t need to go searching for discount codes because when you shop with Rebate Ruth you get cashback as well as coupon codes for your favourite brands. 

Save on all your shopping and earn more often.
Our Notifier will apply the highest eligible cashback rate for that store at that time to your shopping PLUS you will often receive any sales, discounts or loyalty points offered by the store or your card provider on top of cashback from us. 

The Rebate Ruth Notifier is your personal shopping assistant that provides you with the best value every time they shop online.

Download the Extension and sign up to Rebate Ruth today.

Privacy policy: https://rebateruth.com.au/privacy-policy/
Terms and conditions: https://rebateruth.com.au/terms-conditions/
